sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtncntcservice ( instt_id , sys_id , svc_id , svc_nm , requst_mssage_id , rspns_mssage_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , use_at ) VALUES ( #insttId# , #sysId# , #svcId# , #svcNm# , #requstMssageId# , #rspnsMssageId# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() , #useAt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtncntcservice SET instt_id = #insttId# , sys_id = #sysId# , svc_id = #svcId# , svc_nm = #svcNm# , requst_mssage_id = #requstMssageId# , rspns_mssage_id = #rspnsMssageId# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , use_at = #useAt# WHERE 1 = 1 AND instt_id = #insttId# AND sys_id = #sysId# AND svc_id = #svcId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtncntcservice WHERE 1 = 1 AND instt_id = #insttId# AND sys_id = #sysId# AND svc_id = #svcId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT instt_id , sys_id , svc_id , svc_nm , requst_mssage_id , rspns_mssage_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , use_at FROM comtncntcservice WHERE instt_id = #insttId# AND sys_id = #sysId# AND svc_id = #svcId#

SELECT instt_id , sys_id , svc_id , svc_nm , requst_mssage_id , rspns_mssage_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , use_at FROM comtncntcservice WHERE 1=1
instt_id = #searchKeyword#
sys_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY instt_id DESC , sys_id DESC , svc_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

instt_id = #searchKeyword#
sys_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
